            "Hi there, I'm interested in placing an order through the Puregold Mobile App. Can you guide me on how to do it?",
            " Hi, I'm having trouble placing an order on the Puregold Mobile App. Can you help me with that?"
         ],
         "responses":[
            "Sure, I'd be happy to help. To place an order in the Puregold Mobile App, you need to follow these simple steps:\nStep 1: Select the store where you want to place your order.\nStep 2: Scan or search for the item that you want to purchase.\nStep 3: Review the details of your order before placing it, then click the \"Check-out\" button.\nStep 4: Select your preferred mode of payment, then click the \"Place Order\" button.\nNote: For online payment: Wait for the SMS notification to complete the transaction by clicking the \"Pay Now\" button"
         ],

"how to search for a product",
            "search product",
            "find product",
            "browse products",
            "product categories",
            "Hello, I'm having trouble finding a specific product on the Puregold Mobile App. Could you guide me on how to search for it?"
         ],
         "responses":[
            "Sure, I can definitely help you with that. Here are the steps on how to search for a specific product:\nStep 1: You can use the search bar button located on the home page of the app. You can type in the name of the product, and the app will show you the available options.\nStep 2: You can also browse through the list of Official brands available on the app. The app offers various well-known brands to choose from.\nStep 3: Another option is to check each of our product categories. The app offers a wide range of categories, from grocery items to electronics, clothing, and more."
         ],

      {
         "tag":"loyalty",
         "patterns":[
            "How do I link my loyalty card?",
            "Where can I activate my loyalty card?",
            "link loyalty card",
            "activate loyalty card",
            "I have a Puregold loyalty card that I'd like to link to my account on the Puregold Mobile App. Can you guide me through the process?"
         ],
         "responses":[
            "Yes, absolutely! Linking your loyalty card to your account on the Puregold Mobile App is quick and easy. Here are the steps:\nStep 1: Go to the account module on the app.\nStep 2: Select the “Loyalty Card” icon.\nStep 3: Click the “Link Loyalty Card” button.\nStep 4: Encode the 16-digit loyalty card number in the designated field.\nStep 5: Click the “Verify” button.\nStep 6: Encode the validity date of the loyalty card.\nStep 7: A prompt message will be displayed, confirming that you've successfully linked your loyalty card."
         ],
         "context":[
            ""
         ]
      },
